sys_variable_value.value: Your meeting for pet adoption has been scheduled.

sys_element_mapping.value:
Hello Trigger➛Adopting User Record➛Name,

Your Meeting for adopting Trigger➛Adopting User Record➛Select from available pets➛Name has been scheduled on Trigger➛Adopting User Record➛Choose time and date to schedule meeting. 

Please be at your venue Trigger➛Adopting User Record➛Select from available pets➛Adoption Center➛Name on time. 

 

Thanks

Team Pet Adoption
